item.description:
Show time is 5:50. Lets meetup at the escalators near the front door by 5:25. I will be wearing a badge so new people can find me. It is opening weekend for this movie, although we are seeing an earlier show so it may not be an issue, I bought my ticket ahead of time, just in case. I have been to meetups where some people couldn't get in....so be warned!

After the movie, I was thinking it would be fun to go to the Rock Bottom Brewery for munchies and drinks. So if anyone is interested in that we can socialize a bit and talk about the movie.

If you need more information about the flick the official web site is:

To see a trailer go to:

http://www.sonypictur...
item.name: Perfect Stranger
